thread.title: Not off to a good start
thread.title_full: Not off to a good start - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer C
title: Not off to a good start
text: Arrived at hotel and delivery men needed to get in so I held doors open for them even though I had my bags with me. I had to carry my bags up the stairs the bellman was speaking with someone. At check in I was informed the suite I reserved wasn't available and all that was available was a regular king because of overbooking. The suite had 2 rooms and a kitchenette. Breakfast (in restaurant not room service), wifi and the possibility of moving to a suite if during my 4 day stay becomes available. Room was paid in full though Travelocity who I informed of the issues. Last time I stayed here, also for a week, the suite and view were nice but there was no heat in the hotel and they said there was nothing they could do about it, so I guess two times burned.
